pages.text: Blazing rods as produced by the $(l:rftoolspower:powergeneration/blazingagitator)Blazing Agitator$(/l) can be improved even further by infusing them with a stack of certain catalyst items. Note that once infused, a blazing rod can no longer be used in the blazing agitator to help improve other rods

Catalysts (power/time benefit for a full stack):$(br2)$(li)$(item)redstone$() 40% more power$(li)$(item)glowstone$() 10% more power, 30% more time$(li)$(item)quartz$() 40% more time$(li)$(item)dimensional shards$() 60% more power, 60% more time$(li)$(item)nether star$() 120% more power, 120% more time$(li)$(item)ghast tear$() 80% more power, 80% more time
